document.full_text: a bahrain emergency appeals court upheld death sentences on sunday for two men found guilty of killing police officers during recent unrest, punishments human rights activists said were designed to prevent more protests.
document.title: bahrain upholds 2 death sentences in police killings
lines_and_colors: a bahrain emergency appeals court upheld death sentences on sunday for two men found guilty of killing police officers during recent unrest, punishments human rights activists said were designed to prevent more protests.
